document.ModsDocTitle: Two new records of palm species for Gabon: Sclerospermaprofizianum Valk. & Sunder. and Eremospathaquiquecostulata Becc.
document.docAuthor: Bourobou Bourobou, Paul Henri, Niangadouma, Raoul, Issembe, Yves & Couvreur, Thomas L. P.
document.masterDocTitle: Two new records of palm species for Gabon: Sclerospermaprofizianum Valk. & Sunder. and Eremospathaquiquecostulata Becc.

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Two new records of palm species for Gabon: Sclerospermaprofizianum Valk. & Sunder. and Eremospathaquiquecostulata Becc.

subSubSection.paragraph: Eremospatha quiquecostulata Becc. Webbia iii. 279. 1910 ( Beccari 1910 ). Type: Cameroon, Dja, unknown collector (FI). (Fig. 1)

materialsCitation.location: Monts de Cristal National Park, Mbe sector, 800 m from Kinguele ANPN camp, near bridge

subSubSection.paragraph: Documented occurrences: Cameroon, with a single collection in Nigeria and one in Equatorial Guinea Sunderland 2012 (Fig. 2).
